tvdb: Ricky's upset when Marissa says she's quitting the band.  He tells the band to keep rehearsing, despite Stephen's absence. Jamal, Jack, Ian, Lucy & Livvie learn Ali was in a plane crash with Stephen. Jack blasts Ian for losing Tess, then gets upset when Livvie implies Ali's plane crash & Tess's disappearance are connected. Ian plans to fly Rafe in a helicopter to the crash site despite bad weather. Elizabeth's relieved when an injured Ali gains consciousness. Elizabeth apologizes for abandoning her as a child and admits she loves her. Stephen vows to protect them both. A frightened Ali finds herself alone with Stephen.
